name: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition
description:
Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition is an arcade-fighting game developed by Ecole Software and French Bread. It came out on 17-12-2015. SEGA published the game.
You can play Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition on PS Vita, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 3.
Ryutaro Nonaka produced the game. Takaharu Terada directed the game. It was scored by Hideaki Kobayashi, Jun Senoue, Kenichi Tokoi and Mitsuharu Fukuyama.
